CustomTextBox.SqlSelectField: invent.ep_no greinvname,mat.ep_No,mat.ep_Name,matsize.ep_Size,matsize.ep_widthtext,matunit.ep_name munit, Convert(float,invent.ep_quantity) qty,Convert(float,invent.ep_packqty) ep_packqty,invent.ep_packunit,invent.ep_warehouseName,invent.ep_binName,invent.ep_warehouse,invent.ep_bin,invent.ep_batch, CASE invent.ep_owned WHEN 0 THEN '自购' WHEN 1 THEN '客供' ELSE '' END ep_owned, CASE invent.ep_owned WHEN 0 THEN invent.ep_supplier WHEN 1 THEN invent.ep_customer ELSE '' END cusorsup, CASE invent.ep_owned WHEN 0 THEN sup.ep_name WHEN 1 THEN cus.ep_name ELSE '' END cusorsuptxt , invent.ep_factory,CASE invent.ep_checktype WHEN 0 THEN '合格' WHEN 1 THEN '不合格' when 2 then '未知' ELSE null END ep_checktype,Convert(float,invent.ep_unitquantity) ep_unitquantity, invent.ep_attribute1,invent.ep_attribute2,invent.ep_attribute3,invent.ep_attribute4,invent.ep_attribute5, invent.ep_greigeinventorynewid greinvid,mat.ep_materialid matid, smp1.Value,Convert(float,invent.ep_amount) invamount,Convert(float,invent.ep_invtax) invtax,matpackunit.ep_materialpackunitId packunitId

CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: id,编号,姓名

CustomTextBox.TableName: dbo.ep_materialBase material JOIN dbo.ep_materialsizeBase msize ON msize.ep_material = material.ep_materialid JOIN dbo.ep_materialunitBase unit ON unit.ep_materialunitid = material.ep_materialunit JOIN dbo.ep_materialinvattributeBase invattribute ON invattribute.ep_material = material.ep_materialid JOIN dbo.ep_materialbasicsBase AS matwgh ON matwgh.ep_materialbasicsId = msize.ep_uweightunit LEFT JOIN dbo.ep_materialorigin origin ON origin.ep_materialoriginid=msize.ep_materialorigin
CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 物料id,编号,名称,规格,单位,门幅,库存数量,克重,类别,产地,克重单位

CustomTextBox.TableName: dbo.ep_ProductionOrderBase AS pro JOIN dbo.ep_materialBase AS gmat ON gmat.ep_materialId=pro.ep_GreigeNo JOIN dbo.ep_materialBase AS fmat ON fmat.ep_materialId=pro.ep_FinishedGoodsNo JOIN dbo.ep_CustomerBase AS cus ON cus.ep_CustomerId = pro.ep_customer JOIN dbo.ep_materialsizeBase msize ON msize.ep_material = gmat.ep_materialid JOIN dbo.ep_materialunitBase unit ON unit.ep_materialunitid = gmat.ep_materialunit JOIN dbo.ep_materialinvattributeBase invattribute ON invattribute.ep_material = gmat.ep_materialid JOIN dbo.ep_materialbasicsBase AS matwgh ON matwgh.ep_materialbasicsId = msize.ep_uweightunit LEFT JOIN dbo.ep_materialorigin origin ON origin.ep_materialoriginid=msize.ep_materialorigin LEFT JOIN dbo.ep_SOColor AS soc on soc.ep_socolorid= pro.ep_socolorno --订单颜色花型
CustomTextBox.SqlSelectField: pro.ep_No prjsht,pro.ep_ColorOrColorway clrway,cus.ep_Shortname cusname,fmat.ep_no fgno,fmat.ep_name fgname,gmat.ep_no gno,gmat.ep_name gname,CONVERT(FLOAT, msize.ep_unitweight) unitwgh,matwgh.ep_name wghunit,pro.ep_ProductionOrderId,cus.ep_CustomerId,fmat.ep_materialId fgid,gmat.ep_materialId gid,CASE WHEN soc.ep_productiontype=778170000 THEN ISNULL(soc.ep_sehaoName,'')+ISNULL(soc.ep_ColorOrColorway,'') ELSE ISNULL(soc.ep_designnoName,'')+ISNULL(soc.ep_ColorOrColorway,'') end AS color
CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 生产单,颜色花型,客户,成品编号,成品名称,坯布编号,坯布名称,坯布克重,克重单位,生产单id,客户id,成品id,坯布id,颜色/花色

CustomTextBox.TableName: dbo.ep_greigewarehouseform AS main JOIN dbo.ep_greigewarehouseformdtlBase AS detail ON detail.ep_greigewarehouseform = main.ep_greigewarehouseformId JOIN dbo.ep_materialBase AS ms ON ms.ep_materialId = detail.ep_material LEFT JOIN dbo.ep_Customer cus ON CAST(cus.ep_CustomerId AS VARCHAR(100)) = detail.ep_customer LEFT JOIN dbo.ep_Supplier sup ON CAST(sup.ep_SupplierId AS VARCHAR(100)) = detail.ep_supplier
CustomTextBox.SqlSelectField: main.ep_type,main.ep_no,detail.ep_productionorderno productno,CASE WHEN detail.ep_owned=0 THEN sup.ep_name ELSE cus.ep_name END cusorsup,main.ep_warehouseName,ms.ep_name,main.ep_greigewarehouseformId,CASE WHEN detail.ep_owned=0 THEN detail.ep_supplier ELSE detail.ep_customer END cusorsupid,main.ep_tax,main.ep_warehouse
CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 类型,入库单号,生产单编号,客户/供应商,仓库,物料名称,入库单id,客户/供应商id,税率,仓库id
CustomTextBox.SqlWhereFilter: main.ep_type = 1041 AND detail.ep_greigeinventorynew IS NOT NULL AND detail.ep_productionorderno IS NOT NULL

CustomTextBox.TableName: dbo.ep_ProductionOrderBase porder JOIN dbo.ep_ProdOperationSequenceBase pos ON pos.ep_productionorderno = porder.ep_ProductionOrderId --生产单工序 JOIN dbo.ep_OperationSequenceBase os ON os.ep_OperationSequenceId = pos.ep_OperationSequence --工序
CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 编号,id

CustomTextBox.SqlSelectField: ep_materialId dyeid,ep_no dyeno,ep_name dyename,CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 3), 0) useqty,CONVERT(DECIMAL(18, 3), 0) scaleper,'' unit
CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 染化料id,染化料编号,染化料名称,单位数量,占浆比例,单位

CustomTextBox.TableName: dbo.ep_printingsample AS printsamp JOIN dbo.ep_colordesignseriesBase AS clrdesign ON clrdesign.ep_colordesignseriesId = printsamp.ep_designno JOIN dbo.ep_SalesOrderBase AS so ON so.ep_SalesOrderId = printsamp.ep_samplesalesorder JOIN dbo.ep_SOColorBase AS soclr ON soclr.ep_SalesOrderNo = so.ep_SalesOrderId JOIN dbo.ep_materialBase AS mat ON mat.ep_materialId=so.ep_greigeno JOIN dbo.ep_CustomerBase AS cus ON cus.ep_CustomerId = so.ep_customer

CustomTextBox.TableName: dbo.ep_ProductionOrder ep_ProductionOrder JOIN dbo.ep_socolor sc ON ep_ProductionOrder.ep_socolorno=sc.ep_socolorid join dbo.ep_salesorder so ON ep_ProductionOrder.ep_salesorderno=so.ep_salesorderid
CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 生产单编号,id,客户名称,客户ID,颜色/花色,色号/花号,坯布名称,门幅,数量,单价

CustomTextBox.TableName: dbo.ep_ProductionOrder AS po--生产单 CROSS APPLY (SELECT TOP 1 detail.ep_greigewarehouseformName mainno--领坯出库单编号 FROM ep_greigewarehouseformdtl AS detail --坯布仓库操作表明细 JOIN dbo.ep_greigewarehouseformBase AS main ON main.ep_greigewarehouseformId=detail.ep_greigewarehouseform--坯布仓库操作表单主单 WHERE detail.ep_productionorderno=po.ep_No AND main.ep_type=1041 AND main.ep_statuscode=1) AS greout
CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 生产单id,订单号,生产单号,颜色
CustomTextBox.SqlInputValue: (po.ep_no like '%@SqlInputValue%' or po.ep_SalesOrderNoName like '%@SqlInputValue%' or po.ep_ColorOrColorway like '%@SqlInputValue%')

CustomTextBox.GridHeadText: 生产单工序,工序id,生产单,序号,检验要求
CustomTextBox.SqlInputValue: (ep_name like '%@SqlInputValue%' and ep_sequenceno1 like '%@SqlInputValue%' and ep_productionorderno like '%@SqlInputValue%')
